alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Natrona, southeastern Fremont and northeastern Sweetwater Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Sand Draw to 24 miles southwest of Sweetwater Station. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Natrona, southeastern Fremont and northeastern Sweetwater Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Basin
